short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parse IMDb ratings, and view the data through a menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy IMDb

Simply highlight a movie from any page on the internet and right click. It's that simple, and easy! The data that will be returned is a movies/shows title, the rating of the movie/show, the year it was made, runtime, actors, genre, imdbs official rating, and the amount of votes the film/show has! 
We collect ZERO user data and this is also completely AD free. I never had intentions to make money with this back in 2020 and still in 2024 have no desire to. 
-----------------------------------------

Version 0.2.0 | May 25th, 2024
After a long hiatus from this extension, I've decided to patch some UI bugs and push it to Manifest V3. Here are the key updates:

Migrated to Manifest V3: Updated the extension to comply with the latest Chrome extension standards, ensuring better security and performance.
UI Improvements:
Fixed various UI bugs for a smoother user experience.
Enhanced the visual design to be more modern and user-friendly.
Improved Stability: Refactored backend code to improve the stability and performance of the extension.
Updated Permissions: Ensured that the extension requests only the necessary permissions, aligning with best practices for user privacy and security.
Thank you for your continued support and patience!

-----------------------------------------
